sen.j: 令集解（りょうのしゅうげ）は、9世紀前半（868年頃）に編纂された養老律令の注釈書。
sen.e: Ryonoshuge is a commentary on the Yoro Ritsuryo Code written in the early ninth century (around 868).
Ryonoshuge is a commentary on the Yoro Ritsuryo Code written in the early ninth century (around 868).
Ryonoshuge is a commentary on the Yoro Ritsuryo Code written in the early ninth century (around 868).
The commentary is a 50-volume collection (36 of them are still in existence).
The commentary is a 50-volume collection (36 of them are still in existence).
The commentary is a 50-volume collection (36 of them are still in existence).

sen.j: 惟宗直本という学者による私撰の注釈書であり、令義解と違って法的な効力は持たない。
sen.e: This is a private commentary by a scholar named KOREMUNE no Naomoto and unlike Ryo-no-gige (Commentary on the Ryo), it did not have any legal effect.
